hero.title: Gearing Solutions For Industrial Excellence
hero.Oldtitle: Precision Engineering Solutions for Industrial Excellence
hero.subtitle: Shakti Engineers delivers helical geared motors, rotary vibrators, testing machines, bin activators, and electromagnetic vibrator feeders engineered for maximum performance across pharmaceutical, steel, chemical, food processing, and manufacturing industries.

company.name: Shakti Engineers
company.description: Leading manufacturer of precision-engineered industrial equipment, specializing in motors, testing machines, and material handling solutions for pharmaceutical, steel, chemical, food processing, and manufacturing industries.

products.sectionSubtitle: Comprehensive solutions engineered for reliability, efficiency, and performance across industrial applications

featured.name: Sonzogni Camme Mechanical Indexers
featured.shortDescription: High-precision cam-driven indexers for controlled, repeatable, backlash-free rotary and oscillating motion in automation.
keyFeatures: Handle heavy loads and high-speed indexing

featured.name: Enzfelder Screw Jacks
featured.shortDescription: Robust, precise screw jacks for industrial lifting, lowering, and synchronized movement of heavy loads.
keyFeatures: High load capacity models (several kN to hundreds kN)
industries: Steel plant ladle tilting and rolling mills
Tool changers and machine tool tables
Test rigs and wind tunnel positioning

featured.name: Shakti-make Rotary Vibrators
featured.shortDescription: Efficient vibratory solutions for material handling, dosing, and compaction across industries.
keyFeatures: Centrifugal force adjustable from 0 to Max
Heavy-duty bearings ensure long service life

featured.name: Shakti-make Bump & Jolt Machines
featured.shortDescription: Test packaging integrity and durability by simulating real-world transport conditions.
keyFeatures: Rotary vibrator for horizontal jolts (25–50 jolts/sec)

featured.name: Shakti-make Helical Geared Motors
featured.shortDescription: Compact. Efficient. Reliable. Designed for low-speed applications with maximum performance.
keyFeatures: Compact and economical drive for low-speed operations
Single, Double, Triple, and Quadruple reduction options
Heat-treated alloy steel gears and pinions

featured.name: Shakti-make Bin Activators
featured.shortDescription: Ensure uninterrupted discharge from storage bins and prevent material flow issues.

featured.name: Electromagnetic Vibrator Feeder
featured.shortDescription: Driven by a strong electromagnetic vibration system with controller for precise, controllable feed.
keyFeatures: Trays/tubes in SS, rubber, or polyurethane
industries: Metered discharge from hoppers and silos

capabilities.sectionSubtitle: Decades of engineering expertise delivering reliable solutions for critical industrial applications

features.title: 45 Years of Manufacturing Experience
features.description: With over 45 years of expertise, we manufacture durable Geared Motors and Rotary Electrical Vibrators. Our in-house gear design and motor winding ensure precision, reliability, and a longer service life.

features.title: Comprehensive Industry Expertise
features.description: Specialized solutions for pharmaceutical, steel, chemical, food processing, and manufacturing sectors.

features.title: Custom Engineering Solutions
features.description: Tailored designs to meet exact application requirements with complete technical support.

features.title: Quality Assurance Excellence
features.description: Rigorous testing and quality control ensuring highest industry standards and reliability.

benefits.sectionSubtitle: Our solutions deliver measurable improvements to your operations

features.title: Enhanced Operational Efficiency
features.description: Optimize your production processes with precision-engineered equipment designed for maximum uptime and reliability.

features.title: Expert Technical Support
features.description: Access comprehensive engineering consultation, installation guidance, and ongoing technical support from our experienced team.

features.title: Seamless System Integration
features.description: Equipment designed for easy integration with existing manufacturing systems and processes, minimizing downtime during installation.

industries.sectionSubtitle: Trusted solutions across diverse industrial sectors

sectors.name: Pharmaceutical
sectors.description: FDA-compliant equipment for drug manufacturing, powder handling, and quality testing applications.

sectors.name: Steel Industry
sectors.description: Heavy-duty equipment for steel production, material handling, and high-temperature industrial applications.

sectors.name: Food Processing
sectors.description: Food-grade solutions for ingredient handling, processing, and packaging with hygiene compliance.

sectors.name: Chemical Industry
sectors.description: Robust equipment for chemical processing, material handling, and hazardous environment applications.

metadata.pageTitle: SHAKTI - Helical Geared Motors, Rotary Vibrators & Industrial Equipment
metadata.metaDescription: Leading manufacturer of SHAKTI helical geared motors, rotary vibrators, bump & jolt machines, bin activators, and electromagnetic vibrator feeders for pharmaceutical, steel, chemical, food processing, and manufacturing industries.
